chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The camera emits sound in silence at times.
The lower speaker doesn't sound sometimes.
The camera blinks with certain types of light.
Thanks,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if it proceeds.
The customer meets the following requirements for the return to be processed:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Have confirmed that they have the return label.
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: Once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 days for laptops and home appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear ecomobile:

It is a pleasure to greet you.

The reason for my message is that the customer wants a refund of the order, so that you can proceed to make it correctly.

I am waiting for your message.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of the customer's request. We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile:

It is a pleasure to greet you.

According to the tracking updates, the package was successfully delivered yesterday.

You can check it on the link: https://www.chronopost.fr/tracking-no-cms/suivi-page?listeNumerosLT=XJ335774826JF&langue=fr_FR

I would appreciate it if you could check if the package is already in your warehouse.

I will wait for the confirmation of the package reception, and then I will make the refund.

Thank you.

Regards,
Julieta from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We confirmed receipt of the device but our team is still processing the device at the moment. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer yet. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

Regards,
CH

Hi ecomobile,

Please provide a solution to the customer within the next 1 Business day, or unfortunately we’ll have to refund the order, according to the Back Market Quality Charter. 

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Luisa Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JH
